head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GILBERT, EVAN S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GILBERT, EVAN S.

block.p: GILBERT-Evan S. December 21, 2001, age 40. Beloved son of Thomas and the late Rosann Gilbert. Loving brother of Clifford Gilbert. Devoted stepson of Marjorie Gilbert and stepbrother of Wendy Tayer, William Gorlin and Douglas Gorlin. He was President of the golf division of Gilbert Hosiery. He will be deeply missed by all who knew and loved him. Evan was considered to be one of the greatest salesmen in the industry. Funeral service will be held at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st St, Wednesday, 11:30 AM.
